content: A large door stands to the right, and in front of it is a two-headed Rat Captain. These foes are incredibly ferocious, both with their heavy blade, and their unique head combo:

The content is as follows:
A large door stands to the right, and in front of it is a two-headed Rat Captain. These foes are incredibly ferocious, both with their heavy blade, and their unique head combo:
